title: Forbidden Planet Music Pack Pegasus
description: This is a music pack featuring nineteen science fiction instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The Science Fiction Pegasus Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains nineteen orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of science fiction. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


The following instrumentals are included with this asset pack:


A Desolate Planet - A Minor - 65 BPM

Artice Strong Hold 80 BPM - E Minor

Below Zero - A Minor - 65 BPM

Beyond The Horizon Of Ares - A Minor - 65 BPM

D Minor - 130 BPM - The Explorer - Balanced

Descent To Argus 4 - A Minor - 65 BPM

Echoes Of The Past - A Minor - 65 BPM

F Minor - 120 BPM - The Ice Of Bitfrost

Ice Caves Of Pluto - 65 BPM - A Minor

Ice Hurricane - A Minor - 65 BPM

Lion's Head Nebula - G Minor - 120 BPM

Mission Control D Minor - 80 BPM

Night Skies - Strings - Brass - Flute - Piano - A Minor - 90 BPM -

Open Skies - G Major 120BPM

Precious Cargo - A Major - 80 BPM

Sands Of The Oasis - C Minor - 60 BPM

The Ice Artifact - A Minor - 65 BPM

The Monument - C Minor - 60 BPM

The Storm Of Jupiter - A Minor - 65 BPM

Please check out the rest of my asset packs!
technicalDetails:
